name: Evade Slashing
description: Increases Attack Speed, Movement Speed and duration of the caster's debuffs if a Kataria is equipped. This is a passive skill.

name: Howling Blood Strike
description: Powerful Ranged Heroic Attack within range.

name: Slasher Shot
description: Powerful Ranged Heroic Attack within range.

name: Forest Soul Barrier
description: [Party] Temporarily increases Physical Damage, Water Elemental Damage and Dodge of your party members within range.

name: Rage Tornado
description: Temporarily causes Frenzy with a certain chance after a powerful Ranged Heroic Attack within range.

name: Quick Reload
description: Reduces short distance Heroic Damage and Skill Casting time, as well as increases Heroic Attack Power if a Kataria is equipped. This is a passive skill.

name: Hail of Thorns
description: Temporarily causes Hold with a certain chance after a powerful Ranged Heroic Attack in a line.

name: Unstoppable Fierce Shot
description: Temporarily grants an Elemental Blessing to greatly increase the caster's Heroic Attack Power.

name: Ranger`s Quarry
description: Temporarily increases the caster's Heroic Attack Power and Heroic Defense.

name: Eye of the Red Ranger
description: Temporarily causes Fear with a certain chance after a powerful Ranged Heroic Attack within range.
